meanings.definition: The measurement of the depths of oceans, seas, or other large bodies of water.
meanings.sent1: Bathymetry helps scientists understand how deep the ocean is.
meanings.sent2: The ship used advanced bathymetry equipment to map the ocean floor.
meanings.sent3: The bathymetry report revealed a surprising underwater canyon.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of bathymetry plunged to new depths after the research expedition.
meanings.sent5: The bathymetry data painted a clear picture of the underwater landscape.

meanings.definition: The study or science of underwater depth measurements.
meanings.sent1: Scientists use bathymetry to explore the hidden world beneath the waves.
meanings.sent2: Studying bathymetry requires specialized equipment and expertise.
meanings.sent3: The bathymetry class included a fascinating field trip to the coast.
meanings.sent4: In the realm of bathymetry, every measurement tells a unique story.
meanings.sent5: Her passion for bathymetry bubbled to the surface during the research project.
